block.p: Joy Lin joined R/GA, New York, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies, as media director, a new post as the interactive agency adds media buying to its media planning services. Ms. Lin will manage the day-to-day online planning and buying, reporting to Ken O'Donnell, group media director. Ms. Lin had been media director of the New York office of Agency.com, part of the Omnicom Group.

Brandon Berger joined the New York office of MDC Partners as director for digital innovation, a new post. He had held a similar post at Ogilvy North America, New York, part of the Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide unit of the WPP Group.
